pages.text: It turns out the red applefly can be turned into a $(#e6b800)gold applefly$() by putting a red applefly in a jar ontop of a golden block. A player does not need to lure $(#e6b800)the gold applefly towards them as the gold apple fly will always try to follow the player$(). When in a bottle, the golden applefly will provide $(#e6b800)buffed potion effects to nearby players.$()
pages.title: Gold Applefly
